overview: The age of wild men begins, as Kim Doo-han, the Lynx, Goo Ma-heok, Ssang-kal and Shin Ma-jeok take over Jongno. Eom Dong-ok, who was being chased by the police for taking revenge on the Japanese who bullied his friend, decides to punish the Japanese with one blow.
title: Shin Ma-jeok: Stand-up Eom Dong-ok
